name: Help! I downloaded too many mods for [INSERT GENERIC RPG NAME HERE] and now it's attacking me?
name_original: Help! I downloaded too many mods for [INSERT GENERIC RPG NAME HERE] and now it's attacking me?
description:
Help! I downloaded too many mods for [INSERT GENERIC RPG NAME HERE] and now it's attacking me? is a game made in 48 hours for the Fortnighly Fiction Jam 15 and Sunofes 21 game jams.

Follow the adventure of three unlikely heroes and their games owner as they attempt to save their world from the distasters created by mods. Featuring an RPG style combat system, branching choices and an introduction CG. The game takes ~15-30 minutes to complete.
